projects.title: MERN Chat Application
projects.description: A real-time chat application built with MERN stack featuring JWT authentication, WhatsApp-like interface, and secure messaging capabilities. Includes user authentication and real-time communication.

projects.title: Store Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive store management application with inventory tracking, sales management, and reporting features. Built with modern JavaScript and responsive design.

projects.title: Kanban Board
projects.description: A Trello-like kanban board application for task management and project organization. Features drag-and-drop functionality and real-time updates.

projects.title: Notes Application
projects.description: A feature-rich notes application with CRUD operations, search functionality, and markdown support. Built for Hacktoberfest contribution.

projects.title: Quiz Application
projects.description: An interactive quiz application with multiple categories, scoring system, and result tracking. Features responsive design and user-friendly interface.

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe Game
projects.description: A classic Tic Tac Toe game with AI opponent, score tracking, and smooth animations. Features both single-player and two-player modes.

projects.title: Dictionary Application
projects.description: A comprehensive dictionary application with word definitions, pronunciations, and example usage. Integrates with external dictionary APIs.

projects.title: Flappy Bird Game
projects.description: A recreation of the classic Flappy Bird game with smooth animations, score tracking, and responsive controls.

projects.title: Codeforces Filter
projects.description: A chrome extension to filter and display blog entries from Codeforces users with specified minimum ratings and blog quality filters.

projects.title: Payment Flow Testing
projects.description: End-to-end testing implementation for payment flows using public API documentation. Comprehensive testing for merchant payment processing.
